  • City: TYLER
  • State: TX
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident

  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Hazmat was found in the hazmat cage, one of four It had a lose cap and complete fell off. Unknown to the events that caused the cap to come off. there was internal leakage caused interior products to be soiled and stained. DescribePack: The cap was completely off, no inner packaging. Box was soiled / stained, inner leakage, box was on its side not following orientation arrows. DurationRel: 0 and MitigateEffect: placed in a hazmat tote

DescribePack: The entire bottom of the box is wet. DurationRel: 11 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed into a hazmat bag and moved to the damage area.

item.title: Report X-2023120898
item.description:
Report X-2023120898

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-02T15:11:53+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-15
  • City: ABILENE
  • State: TX
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: At 4:56 am at door 10 in the unload PH called out to management that there was a leaking hazmat package. Manager addressed the issue quickly by grabbing gloves, apron and hazmat spill bin. Grabbed 3 hazmat package out the back of trailer #836334 from FTWO that were affected by the one leaking hazmat. Took the bin over to QA to separate corrosive spill from explosive hazmat. DescribePack: Hazmat package failure was a corrosive package that was laid inappropriately on his side instead up right by the orientation arrows. Another identical hazmat package was also inappropriately laid on its side on top of the leaking hazmat. Bottom hazmat was crushed by the pressure and had a failed lid closure due to weight and being laid inappropriately and unsafely in back of the trailer. DurationRel: 2 and MitigateEffect: package was placed in hazmat bin immediately upon discovery. Loose lid was also tightened.

Package was then taken to cage 2 for isolation and processing at 0747 DescribePack: Cap came loose and leaked DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: package was placed in proper hazmat containers and isolated to QA cage 2 for processing

item.title: Report X-2023120794
item.description:
Report X-2023120794

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-30T17:46:52+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-18
  • City: ROUND ROCK
  • State: TX
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDED TO A PACKAGE THAT WAS COLD TO THE TOUCH. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED APPROXIMATELY FOUR POUNDS OF DRY ICE COOLING STEAKS. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX TO INDICATE DRY ICE WAS BEING SHIPPED. OUTER BOX HAS A KEEP FROZEN STICKER APPLIED. THIS PACKAGE HAS NOT BEEN ACCEPTED FOR AIR OR TRANSPORTED IN THE AIR BY UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO. THE PACKAGE WAS SHIPPED FROM TEXAS USING UPS ACCOUNT NUMBER 8085EA, TCS, 1311 WEST 2ND STREET, TAYLOR TX 76574-2434.

item.title: Report X-2023120926
item.description:
Report X-2023120926

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-30T17:46:52+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-16
  • City: FORT WORTH
  • State: TX
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was found on load side of hub next to a set of rollers. A small puncture hole was noticed on the top corner of the container. DescribePack: Bucket was still mostly full but a small amount of liquid was seen seeping out of the small puncture hole after container was moved to Hazmat cage. DurationRel: 0 and MitigateEffect: Bucket was in the upright position when found and not actively leaking. Bucket was placed in a salvage drum and moved to Hazmat cage.

item.title: Report X-2023120935
item.description:
Report X-2023120935

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-30T17:46:52+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-16
  • City: FORT WORTH
  • State: TX
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: 1. X-2023120935 SequenceEvent: A driver noticed that the package was leaking. That driver placed the package in front of the hazmat cage in a damage hazmat tote. I moved the tote, to the damaged hazmat processing area. DescribePack: Loose caps and a poor-quality seam on one of the bottles caused the package to leak. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: I placed the package in the Damaged hazmat cage, to prevent further damage. 2. X-2023120936 SequenceEvent: A driver placed this package in a damaged hazmat tote on top of another hazmat. I separated the packages from each other on entry into the damaged hazmat processing area. DescribePack: Poor seam quality led to one of the three bottles leaking from the top. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: I separated the package from other packages, to attempt to prevent further damage.

item.description:
Report X-2023120806

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-03T15:12:34+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-27
  • City: BRYAN
  • State: TX
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was unloaded from the trailer and had leaked and damaged the exterior packaging it was shipped in. Package was placed into a liquid spill bucket and brought over to QA staging area. DescribePack: Package was in a FedEx repack box and not repackaged in the proper shipping packaging that was needed. Which caused it to spill within the package and damaged the package it was repacked in. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Liquid spill tote with liner.
